actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the further extension or establishment of national monuments in the State of Nevada except by express authorization of Congress, and for other purposes.
subjects: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

summary.text:
Nevada Land Sovereignty Act of 2015

Prohibits any further extension or establishment of national parks and monuments in Nevada from being undertaken, except by express authorization of Congress.

 Prohibits the Department of the Interior from implementing, administering, or enforcing Secretarial Order No. 3310 issued on December 22, 2010, which requires the Bureau of Land Management to inventory public lands with wilderness characteristics.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the further extension or establishment of national monuments in the State of Nevada except by express authorization of Congress, and for other purposes.
